article_title: 4A boys' Championship: Apple Valley 64, Champlin Park 61
article_text:
Aaron Lavinsky – Star Tribune

Gallery: The Champlin Park bench is in disbelief after they were called for a foul late in the second half, leading to Apple Valley free throws.

og.description: Apple Valley ruined Champlin Park's bid for an undefeated season with a 64-61 victory in the Class 4A boys' basketball state tournament title game on Saturday at the Target Center.
og.title: 4A boys' Championship: Apple Valley 64, Champlin Park 61
